# encode(to:)

**Instance Method**

Serializes captured room data to the specified encoder.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(to encoder: any Encoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **encoder**: An object that the captured room data serializes to.

## Discussion

An app might serialize a [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoomData] object to defer processing to a later date or to defer processing to another device.
